application.main

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.main.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    The class Controller is used to manage the GUI

    Since:
    24-06-2021
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Felix Wensky
    See Also:
    CardList

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void addPointPlayerOne()
      Adds a point for player one
      (package private) void addPointPlayerTwo()
      Adds a point for player two
      (package private) void changeNamePlayerOne()
      Changes name for player one
      (package private) void changeNamePlayerTwo()
      Changes name for player two
      (package private) void changeOnMove()
      Changes the player that is on move - shown by a red circle next to the players name
      (package private) void displayOptions()
      The displayOptions method is used to open the OptionsDialog and change the settings
      (package private) void flipAllCards()
      Flips all cards (used for debug)
      (package private) void flipCard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Flips the given Card (Card is calculated by mouse position)
      (package private) javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] getImageList()
      For better readability this method outsources the creation of the array in which all images are stored
      (package private) javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] getPlayerOneCardList()
      For better readability this method outsources the creation of the array in which all playerOneCards are stored
      (package private) javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] getPlayerTwoCardList()
      For better readability this method outsources the creation of the array in which all playerTwoCards are stored
      (package private) Player getWinner()
      Determines the winner - if both players have the same amount of point its a draw
      void initialize()
      Called when the GUI is launched - Creates two players and sets all attributes to their default values by using the reset() method
      void reset()
      The reset method is used to reset all attributes back to their default values - Cards are newly shuffled and put back on the Board
      (package private) void resetHidden()
      The resetHidden method is used to newly render all hidden images that are still in the game
      (package private) void resetPlayerOneCards()
      The resetPlayerOneCards method is used to delete all icons of the pairs that player one has collected
      (package private) void resetPlayerTwoCards()
      The resetPlayerTwoCards method is used to delete all icons of the pairs that player two has collected

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getImageList

        javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] getImageList()
        For better readability this method outsources the creation of the array in which all images are stored
        Returns:
        An array that contains the ImageView objects of all Cards

      • getPlayerOneCardList

        javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] getPlayerOneCardList()
        For better readability this method outsources the creation of the array in which all playerOneCards are stored
        Returns:
        An array that contains mageView objects of all Cards that player one collected

      • getPlayerTwoCardList

        javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] getPlayerTwoCardList()
        For better readability this method outsources the creation of the array in which all playerTwoCards are stored
        Returns:
        An array that contains mageView objects of all Cards that player two collected

      • getWinner

        Player getWinner()
        Determines the winner - if both players have the same amount of point its a draw
        Returns:
        The winner

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Called when the GUI is launched - Creates two players and sets all attributes to their default values by using the reset() method

      • reset

        public void reset()
        The reset method is used to reset all attributes back to their default values - Cards are newly shuffled and put back on the Board

      • resetHidden

        void resetHidden()
        The resetHidden method is used to newly render all hidden images that are still in the game

        void resetPlayerOneCards()
        The resetPlayerOneCards method is used to delete all icons of the pairs that player one has collected

      • resetPlayerTwoCards

        void resetPlayerTwoCards()
        The resetPlayerTwoCards method is used to delete all icons of the pairs that player two has collected
